content: So, we'll certainly dive more deeply into the various symptoms and the impact on PFS score in the rich data set that we're going to see from PIONEER, but I've really been extraordinarily convinced that all of these symptoms individually and combined can be tremendously life changing and the disappearance thereof will really return these patients to what â I've started to call the new normal, you hear so many stories about people saying, I've never felt this good before because they've been living with this disease for so long.
